title: Bug 109718 - Tips Displaying Large Content in One Line
description: When saving and placing the mouse cursor on a text item with large content, the expected behavior is that the tips should be displayed in a given format. However, the actual result is that the tips are shown in a single line.
OB: When saving and placing the mouse cursor on a text item with large content, the tips are displayed in one line instead of the expected format.
EB: When saving and placing the mouse cursor on a text item with large content, the tips should be displayed in the expected format.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Save a text item with a large content.
2. Place the mouse cursor on the text item.
